description:
Tabitha is a quiet girl who is a classmate and the best friend of Kirche. She is a triangle wind mage. She is also Louise`s classmate. Throughout the series she is almost always reading a book and is usually seen with a large curved staff, which she uses in place of a wand. She does not allow any emotion to show on her face, says little about herself and and often does not respond to questions. Alternately, she may give neutral and incomplete answers, such as `Don`t know`.
Her real identity is Charlotte, crown princess of Gallia. She was forced to assume a new identity in the aftermath of the coup d`etat of her uncle http://anidb.net/ch39540 [Joseph] against her father. After the defeat of Joseph and the recovery of her mother she became first-in-line to the throne of Gallia again but has delayed her coronation so far.
name: Tabitha
